v-model.description: Selected date（ISO 8601 format, YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM）
v-model.description_zh: Selected date（ISO 8601 format, YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM）

type.description: Picker type, optional values date month year
type.description_zh: Picker type, optional values date month year

allowed-dates.description: Restricts which dates can be selected
allowed-dates.description_zh: Restricts which dates can be selected

title-color.description: Color of picker title. If not specified it will use color prop or the default picker color.
title-color.description_zh: Color of picker title. If not specified it will use color prop or the default picker color.

elevation.description: Elevation level, options true false and level of 0-24
elevation.description_zh: Elevation level, options true false and level of 0-24

first-day-of-week.description: Sets the first day of the week, starting with 0 for Sunday.
first-day-of-week.description_zh: Sets the first day of the week, starting with 0 for Sunday.

show-current.description: Whether to display the current date
show-current.description_zh: Whether to display the current date

multiple.description: Allow the selection of multiple dates
multiple.description_zh: Allow the selection of multiple dates

range.description: Allow the selection of date range
range.description_zh: Allow the selection of date range

events.name: preview
events.params: year: number month: number day?: number

slots.name: year
slots.description: Custom the year in the title
slots.description_zh: Custom the year in the title

slots.name: month

slots.description_zh: Custom the month in the title

slots.name: date
slots.description: Custom the date in the title
slots.description_zh: Custom the date in the title

slots.name: range
slots.description: Custom the range in the title
slots.description_zh: Custom the range in the title

slots.name: multiple
slots.description: Custom the multiple in the title
slots.description_zh: Custom the multiple in the title
